question_sentence: Rep. Liz Cheney, a Trump critic, has been removed from this third most-powerful GOP position in the House:
Ellen DeGeneres announced the end of her talk show citing what reason?
NBC canceled airing which awards ceremony for 2022?
Amid a gas shortage in the Southeast, consumer safety officials warned Americans not to:
choices: Try to make their own gasoline
Smoke while filling up their tanks

question_sentence: The 2021 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame inductees were announced this week. Which artist is not part of this year’s class?
A closely watched Chinese rocket reentered the atmosphere over which ocean?
The NFL expanded its regular season for 2021. How many games are scheduled for each team?
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention endorsed lowering the age limit for the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine to which age this week?
According to Medina Spirit’s trainer, what type of drug did the Kentucky Derby-winning horse test positive for in a post-race test?
The CDC has identified new cases of a rare blood clotting disorder in people who received the J&J vaccine, bringing the total to:
What critical piece of energy-related infrastructure was compromised in a ransomware attack in the United States, sparking major fuel shortages and panic-buying, including a run on gasoline?
evidence: Colonial Pipeline was targeted in the ransomware attack, causing a days-long shutdown of one of the country’s largest pipeline systems that supplies gasoline, diesel and jet fuel to much of the east coast.

question_sentence: K. P. Sharma Oli was forced to step down as prime minister this week after public scrutiny over his response to the Covid-19 crisis. In what country did he serve?
evidence: Oli stepped down as prime minister of Nepal following the vote of no confidence, a culmination of his touting of unproven coronavirus remedies and backlash for his handling of a second wave of the virus.

question_sentence: Which professional baseball team says that seven of its coaching and support staff tested positive for Covid-19 despite being vaccinated?
evidence: The New York Yankees claim seven of its staff, all of whom were inoculated with the single-dose Johnson & Johnson vaccine, test positive for the virus. Six of the seven were reportedly asymptomatic.

question_sentence: Three prominent journalists fled Myanmar in the aftermath of February’s brutal military coup. In which country were they eventually arrested for illegal entrance?
evidence: The journalists, all with the independent Burmese news agency Democratic Voice of Burma (DVB) were detained in Thailand. Many fear that the journalists will “face certain arrest and persecution” if deported.

question_sentence: This channel has decided not to air next year’s Golden Globes following controversy surrounding the Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA), the nonprofit responsible for the awards.
evidence: NBC has broken their long-running association with the HFPA after outcry over the group’s lack of diversity and ethical questions surrounding alleged practices of giving financial benefits to select members.

question_sentence: Voyager 1, one of NASA’s longest-flying spacecraft, has detected what fascinating phenomenon beyond the outer reaches of our solar system?
evidence: Voyager 1, launched in September 5 1977, has recently detected a “persistent hum” caused by the sounds of plasma waves coming from beyond our solar system – the data itself being sent from the craft 14 billion miles away from Earth.

question_sentence: This country is conflicted over the US troop withdrawal in Afghanistan. While the country almost always opposes foreign intervention, it supported a US military presence because it stabilized the region near this country, including the small border it shares with Afghanistan.
evidence: China’s leadership has issued conflicting statements on how Beijing feels about the US withdrawal. On one hand, the withdrawal could be a strategic opportunity for China. On the other, it could destabilize the region once again.

question_sentence: What long-awaited reunion of the cast of this iconic show is finally coming to HBO Max at the end of May?
evidence: The Friends reunion show will hit HBO Max on May 27th as an “unscripted celebration” of the sitcom.

question_sentence: The infamous “Brood X,” the swarm of billions of cicadas anticipated this summer, are showing up a little late because of the cool weather. About how often does this major brood resurface?
evidence: This brood, which will blanket parts of the country from Tennessee to New York, appears once every 17 years.

question_sentence: This week, a group of House Republicans voted to oust fellow Republican Liz Cheney from her Congressional leadership position. What position was she forced to relinquish?
evidence: The House Republican Conference voted to remove Cheney as chair of the group. Under the position, Cheney was effectively the third most powerful Republican in the House.
